meanings.definition: Having or showing quick intelligence or ready mental capability
meanings.sent1: She is the smartest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: He is known as the smartest person in the office.
meanings.sent3: The smartest squirrel in the park always finds the most nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her smartest move was to invest in that company.
meanings.sent5: The smartest decision he made was to study every day.

meanings.definition: Quick or prompt in action or response
meanings.sent1: The smartest cat caught the mouse in seconds.
meanings.sent2: Being the smartest player on the team, she always knew what to do.
meanings.sent3: The smartest alarm clock woke him up right on time.
meanings.sent4: Her smartest reflex saved her from falling.
meanings.sent5: The smartest reaction to the fire was to call for help immediately.

meanings.definition: Clever or witty in a way that shows intelligence or good judgment
meanings.sent1: He came up with the smartest joke at the party.
meanings.sent2: She had the smartest response to his teasing.
meanings.sent3: The smartest hat at the store had a hidden pocket.
meanings.sent4: His smartest comment made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent5: The smartest way to win the argument was to stay calm and logical.
